text: Myristica grandifolia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Fiji. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica grandifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Endemic flora of Fiji grandifolia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myristica grandifolia
